Plot: Lena heads to her Auntie JoJo and Uncle Pops' for annual Christmastime festivities. Little does she know, this Christmas will be like none of the rest.
Title: California Romanza
Writer: Jennifer Hibbs (inspired by), Eva Mendes, Massy Tadjedin
Actors: Troy Garity, Kathy Najimy, Christina Ricci, Daniel Stern
